nodes.text: Blood Stalker was a Pantran whitefang living on Hothduring the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY it was captured by ex-Mandalorian Terror Brigade and used as a challenge in their Onslaught challenge. Blood Stalker was killed by Republic forces seeking to claim from the Terror Brigade Imperial Moff Yoren.
Blood Stalker appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic as one of the bosses in the heroic quest "The Terror Brigade."
